ingredients: Whole milk, calcium (tricalcium phosphate), iron (ferric pyrophosphate), zinc (zinc sulfate), lactase enzyme, vitamin C (ascorbic acid), vitamin E (DL-alpha-tocopheryl acetate), vitamin A (retinyl acetate), vitamin D (cholecalciferol), sodium citrate, sodium triphosphate, sodium phosphate monobasic, sodium phosphate dibasic
